history.proof: unfold Cmod. qsimpl use: Cmod_opp. qsimpl use: Rabs_R1,Cmod_opp. qsimpl use: exp_0,Rabs_R1,Cmod_opp. scongruence use: sqrt_Rsqr_abs, Rplus_0_l, Rplus_comm, Rabs_Ropp, Rmult_0_r, Rmult_1_r, Rsqr_eq_asb_1, Ropp_0 unfold: Rsqr.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of Cmod_opp (Cmod (- _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of Rabs_R1 (Rabs 1) does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment H1 : forall x : C, Cmod (- x) = Cmod x H0 : Rabs 1 = 1 Unable to unify "exp 0 = 1" with "sqrt (- (1) * (- (1) * 1) + - 0 * (- 0 * 1)) = 1".

original: unfold Cmod. rewrite Cmod_opp. rewrite Rabs_R1. apply exp_0.
